Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern.name: Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

labels.label:
Step 1, get difference between start and end time
Step 1.5, Add number of times this has happened?

Problem:
- Splunk API = 500,000 limit (unless otherwise set)

Possible Solution:
- Run search for 1 day
- If totalEvents >= 500,000, half time
- Need to hold the queryable time so it can be halved

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description:
Start time in unix epoch format. Accepts Seconds precision.
Use: https://www.unixtimestamp.com/

parameters.name: splunk_port
parameters.description: The Splunk API/ Management port. Default is 8089.

parameters.name: search_quantity
parameters.description: The number of records to read per query. Ensure this value is below the value of "maxresultrows" in the configuration files. Typically defaults to 50,000

parameters.name: splunk_host
parameters.description: The API accessible Hostname/ IP address of the Splunk instance.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to be returned by Splunk. Ensure this value is below the value of "max_count" in the configuration files. Typically defaults to 500,000

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description:
End time in unix epoch format. Accepts Seconds and Millisecond precision.
Use: https://www.unixtimestamp.com/

parameters.name: es_agent_host
parameters.description: The accessible hostname/IP of the Elastic Agent being used to receive the events.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description:
One or more new line delimited indices.
New lines are created with "shift + enter"

parameters.name: query_range
parameters.description: The number of seconds to query at a time
